name: Alan Osburn
text: This location truly cares about its guests. We had an issue with our delivery because of our error in putting in our address. They were kind enough to work with us and remade the order when they didn't have to. Love this location and they take care of their guests!

name: Allen N
text: Always happy with our orders from Hungry Howie's. Whether it is pick up or delivery, they are always prompt and the pizza is hot and tasty. This is my families preferred place. Thank you for years of awesome pizza!

name: OMG EMMA
text: Good pizza as usual. They have some good deals here and there.

name: Jeff Buckland
text: üò∑ making sure I have mask on to tell review..lol. I ordered from their $5 lunch menu. Wonderful üçï.

name: Shane Holt
text: Wonderful staff and very quick with the pick up order. Delicious pepperoni and sausage pizza with Butter Cheese crust. BBQ Wings also on point.

name: Tom Davis
text: No delivery to a working man that does not have address working in the local community out of his work truck and trailer. Sucks

name: Marta S
text: I'm a first time customer.  I'd received a coupon for a free birthday pizza so I decided to try it.  The first thing I noticed was how clean and orderly the place was.  The staff was courteous.  In less than 15 minutes, I had a hot delicious pizza.  I picked the garlic crust with pepperoni.... I'll certainly return!

name: Jeremy Pelt
text: Love this place, best pie in town!

name: K R
text: I love Hungry Howie's pizza. All of the workers here are really nice and attentive. The manager is not very friendly and her stress is very evident. I wish they still gave parmesan cheese with your pizza. Food quality is pretty consistent. ‚Ä¶More

name: David Jones
text: Pizza is always good and they have the best bone-in chicken wings out of all the pizza chains in Midland, with Pizza Hut having the next best wings. Other places you go to they seem slightly undercooked and I can only imagine that it feels like you're gnawing down on someones foreskin.

name: Nathaniel Blackwood
text: This particular location has always served me well. Their employees deserve every compliment and recommendations they get. I have never had any complaints from this location and I don't expect to have one anytime soon. Hungry Howies employees in Midland, Michigan deserve all of the respect they get!

name: Carson Gilbert
text: I Made an order 2 hours ahead of time and still had to wait in the parking lot for 20 min. And my order was messed up. Never ordering from here again

name: vicki R
text: Not good. Two employees saw us come in - no greeting - left us standing there several minutes. Another employee finally came to the counter - minimally pleasant. Very odd/unpleasant taste to both pizza and bread sticks - unsure if it was cheese or spice but ICK! We will not be back

name: Sandra Arnold
text: Not impressed with hungry howies. But my son likes it. So we got it for him.

name: Ali Miller
text: Food was good however the order was messed up. When we called to figure out a solution the manager told me that they wouldn't do anything about it. You can go to other pizza places in Midland for pizzas that‚Äôs just as good but with better customer service skills.

name: Stephen W
text: ate here awhile ago, service was excellent . noah is the best

name: Eric Chapman
text: Awesome food- fast service -- sandwiches are always my go to

name: Amber Bartlett
text: Everything was amazing! Exactly how I ordered it. And the delivery guy was super nice!

name: Erin Oswald
text: Ready on time. Also, very hot! Super happy.

name: Mouse House
text: Great cheap family pizzas

name: Tad Crosby
text: They forget small things somewhat frequently like ranch packets with wings or adding pizza sauce to subs but overall thats uncommon and overall they're pretty good.

name: Jack Geiser
text: This place is the bomb!!! great pizza and for any of my my truck driving buddies that load out of Dow Chemical, they CAN GET TO THE TRUCK YARD!!! the guy called me and I gave him turn by turn directions to get in here!! they know how to get here now so if you want damn good pizza, they can get bring it to you

name: Juan Martinez
text: Every now and again we go with Hungry Howies, it's never my favorite but always good, online coupons made it a great value.  Keep up the good work. ‚Ä¶More

name: Amber Boman
text: Ordered a medium pizza with extra cheese and pepperoni on half and got a very sad looking pizza with barely any cheese on the side with no pepperoni. I used to love ordering from this Hungry Howies, but the last few times I've ordered from this location have been incredibly disappointing with much lower quality of product being put out.

name: Deborah Taylor
text: I haven't had Hungry Howie's in years, but I had always remembered it as extremely good pizza. The pizza I got yesterday was lackluster at best. Several slices didn't even have topping on it! The "Three Cheese" Howie bread was flavorless. Don't think I'll go back.

name: David Altergott Jr
text: Hungry Howie's is the best fast food pizza for sure.

name: James Prather
text: Everyone will like this. About a week ago we ordered from here. Simple order 3 subs. 2 subs normal as they come, one sub special.  The special sub is steak, cheese, and mushrooms only. Well guess what after the third time of them delivering ‚Ä¶More

name: Shawn Kind
text: You have to love there Pizza app for the phone I just got my free pizza again

name: daniel garcia
text: Great food

name: Elysabeth Lindauer
text: I literally called twice last night because they forget my pepsi and my garlic butter then to open up the pizzas to find out one of them didn't even have the butter crust i ordered!! The guy brought back the pepsi but no sauce!! There were ‚Ä¶More

name: Silver Bullet WS6
text: Food is great, prices are excessive!

name: Dennis D.
text: Perfect every time!

text: For the most part. Pizza is always fresh & pretty good. Would recommend this pizza joint to anyone

text: Pizza was really good. Thing was though our delivery guy smelled like weed and so did the pizza box‚Äôs.

text: Love howies, great food, nice people, good prices.

name: Reva Martinez
text: First time there and we will definitely be back, the pizza was great, the workers were so polite order was ready fast I HONESTLY have NOTHING bad to say about this place.

name: a frank
text:
Great pizza!

Toppings were very fresh.
